    Amy

    A song from The Oral Cigarettes released in 2016 under the album "FIXION".

    「今何してる?」
    Ima nani shiteru?
    What are you doing right now?
    Kanji
    Romaji
    English
    今
    ima
    now
    何
    nani
    what
    してる
    shiteru
    doing, to be in
    「きっと恋してる」
    Kitto koi shiteru
    I'm definitely in love.
    Kanji
    Romaji
    English
    きっと
    kitto
    surely, certainly, definitely
    恋
    koi
    romantic love
    してる
    shiteru
    doing, to be in
    「こんな思いなんて初めてなの」って
    Konna omoi nante hajimete nano tte
    I've never felt this way before.
    Kanji
    Romaji
    English
    こんな
    konna
    like this, this kind of
    思い
    omoi
    feeling, thought, emotion
    なんて
    nante
    such as, things like
    初めて
    hajimete
    for the first time
    なの
    nano
    -soften sentence-
    って
    tte
    -quotative particle-
